articles.title: Farmers in Argentina have sold 35.7 mln tonnes of 2020/21 soybeans
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Dec 15 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 35.7 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 season after transactions for 327,800 tonnes in the most recent week period, the Agriculture Ministry said on Wednesday in a report that included data through Dec. 8.The rhythm of sales was behind that of the previous season.
